data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mifsud, David, Daccordi, Mauro (2019): Colaphellus palaestinus Achard, a new leaf-beetle for Europe (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Chrysomelinae). Zootaxa 4565 (3): 447-450, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4565.3.13|18 occurrences
